content.raw: Adrian Mikeliunas provides senior-level technical and strategic consulting service to clients seeking Risk & Compliance Security Consulting services. He has long been active in the industry, and his work consistently exceeds client expectations. His technical experience is extensive with projects focusing on Cyber Security and Identity Management. Adrian has a proven track record with identifying and resolving issues in diverse, technical environments and coordinating teams for installations, upgrades, and problem resolution. Adrian possesses excellent interpersonal, organizational, and communication skills, and has proven to be a goal-oriented, diligent, and a very resourceful consultant. I currently teach information security courses for Learning Tree International.

content.raw:
Learn the information security principles to lock down and secure your WordPress website.

You will learn about weak passwords, faulty themes or plugins, or even old WordPress installations and the steps to take to secure your site today.

Learn Adrian's top 3 rule for selecting plugins (or themes) to avoid costly installation mistakes.

Use plain php or javascript code, a few database hacks or as an alternative, free or paid plugins to secure your website content, your user privacy and ultimately making your website hacker-proof!

You will also learn how to take serious countermeasures and store multiple backups in multiple locations, fully automated!
